name: Lost Spirit (Torben, confusedphoenix)
description:
Summary

Run through the forest and search for the lost soul of your dear companion. Collect fragments of their spirit and put them all together by avoiding pitfalls and using  a newfound power given to you by a mysterious entity.

_________________________________

Controls

  • A - Move Left
  • D - Move Right
  • E - When close to the spirit, press E for dialogue
  • Spacebar - Jump
  • Shift - Sprint
  • Right Click - Turn into Ash State

_________________________________
